dict.string: url=$(curl 2>/dev/null http://paste.textmate.org/submit -F user="$USER" -F text="$(expand -t $TM_TAB_SIZE)") osascript -e 'tell application "Colloquy" to send message "I just pasted: '"$url"'" to (get chat room "##textmate" of (first connection where server address is equal to "irc.freenode.net"))'
